attributes.action: introduce legislation to ban the playing of the song 'Howzat' by Sherbet during limited overs cricket matches
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a batsman is caught out during a limited overs cricket match, the ECB and Counties insist on playing 'Howzat' by the band Sherbet over the sound system in the belief that it is hilariously funny as it contains the line 'you messed around, I caught you out'. On the contrary, it's unbelievebly annoying and not even mildly amusing.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
